TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileSystemAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class FileSystemAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an access rule for a file or directory.

span.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an access rule for a file or directory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表基礎的存取控制項目 (ACE)，指定使用者帳戶的存取權 （讀取、 寫入等等） 提供，類型的抽象概念，以及是否要允許或拒絕該權限。The class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to allow or deny that right. 這個類別也可以指定存取規則要如何散佈到子物件。This class can also specify how access rules are propagated to child objects. 使用類別來建立新的存取規則。Use the class to create a new access rule. 您可以使用規則來保存或類別。You can persist the rule using the or class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來新增，然後從檔案移除存取控制項目 (ACE)。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立，可持續使用的存取控制規則或類別。Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the or class. 存取控制規則定義決定允許或不允許在執行 Microsoft Windows 電腦上有哪些動作的使用者帳戶權限。Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that describes whether to allow or deny the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立，可持續使用的存取控制規則或類別。Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the or class. 存取控制規則定義決定允許或不允許在執行 Microsoft Windows 電腦上有哪些動作的使用者帳戶權限。Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows. `identity`參數必須識別目前的電腦或網域上的有效帳戶。The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain. 字串會採用下列格式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的網域或電腦名稱的名稱和`account`是有效的使用者帳戶網域或電腦上的名稱： `DOMAIN\account`。The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來新增，然後從檔案移除存取控制項目 (ACE)。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立，可持續使用的存取控制規則或類別。Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the or class. 存取控制規則定義決定允許或不允許在執行 Microsoft Windows 電腦上有哪些動作的使用者帳戶權限。Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows. `identity`參數必須識別目前的電腦或網域上的有效帳戶。The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain. 字串會採用下列格式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的網域或電腦名稱的名稱和`account`是有效的使用者帳戶網域或電腦上的名稱： `DOMAIN\account`。The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`.
